price: 18. Allahas jau žino tuos iš jų, kurie sulaiko (vyrus) nuo kovos Vardan Allaho, ir tuos, kurie sako savo broliams: „Ateikite čia prie mūsų.“ kai jie (patys) neina į mūšį, tik truputį.
arabic: ۞ قَدۡ يَعۡلَمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُعَوِّقِينَ مِنكُمۡ وَٱلۡقَآئِلِينَ لِإِخۡوَٰنِهِمۡ هَلُمَّ إِلَيۡنَاۖ وَلَا يَأۡتُونَ ٱلۡبَأۡسَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qad yaʿlamu al-lahu al-muʿawiqīna minkum wal-qāilīna li-ikh'wānihim halumma ilaynā walā yatūna al-basa illā qalīlan
